website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't have a lot of fancy features, its slim design, reliable wash cycles, and quiet operation make it worth a look.
pros: Owners love its small footprint, whisper quiet operation, and reliable results
Doesn't tend to leave spots on dishes
cons: Some large dishes, pots, and pans may not fit
The drying cycle isn't as effective as the 6 wash cycles
Customer service could be more attentive

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and more
customer_reviews.text: We got a call an hour before it was going to arrive. The Danby dishwasher is performing tremendously well. Our dishwasher left detergent residue and never drained properly, this one is performing perfectly. No more second guessing!! We also wanted to support Danby because of the charitable nature of the CEO. He does in extremely good deeds like helping refugees find work at his wharehouse and provides for them in Their greatest time of need. 5 stars for a great product, and feels good Everytime I run a load, I think of all the good Danby does!!! :) :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to...
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about the Danby is it is small; great for small kitchens. The worst thing about the Danby is it is small. Doesn't fit many dishes. Having said that, it is fine for for one or two people. The hookup to the faucet is easy and only takes a few seconds. It doesn't leak either. While operating, you can hear it. It's not whisper quiet, but certainly not objectionable. Oh almost forgot. The dishes come out clean and dry! If a portable dryer fits your needs, this one is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: It broke. The warranty isn't helping us
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable dishwasher in March 2018. It really worked terrific. But after 4 months dirty water started pooling in the bottom. Turns out the pump broke, and the repair person Danby sent us to only picks up the phone one day in 5 (and definitely doesn't return calls). He has a 1 star average Yelp review. It's been a month and it's still broken. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Now i love the way it cleans
customer_reviews.text: So let me start by saying i bought this to prevent fights between whos doing dishes. So that being said it serves its purpose. Now i love the way it cleans. I mean my dishes are sparkling clean. However i was really hoping for dishes not to be soaked when they are done. I mean not a deal breaker. I just leave the door open a let them air dry. But i feel for almost $500 they shouldnt come out soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact rollaway machine.
customer_reviews.text: I knew I would like this. I had to leave one of the same model behind in a move. That I got another one should tell you something.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: the dishwasher is working fine so far
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher was delivered in a badly torn package. The washer has dirt and water dropplets in the body. On three corners of the wooden top, there are cracks. Two fold down upper tines are missing. Not sure whose fault is this - Amazon or Danby, but it is unacceptable when one pays for nearly $500 (including tax) for an item. Other than the damage, the dishwasher is working fine so far. May be I should have bought it from Homedepot instead of Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a month...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a month, then it stopped draining....still waiting for the company to respond to my repair. Im having a hard time getting the company to respond. Very disappointed because this dishwasher got good reviews and I thought the company stood by their products. Look for another brand, I don't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Noble

customer_reviews.title: Leaked during first use
customer_reviews.text: This thing leaked everywhere. It was not even pumping water into the tub, instead it was pumping water all over the floor. I contacted Amazon who told me to contact Danby, called them and they told me to contact Amazon who said they could refund my money, but I would have to purchase another one if I wanted to. I went online and ordered another one. Hopefully this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Van de Meulebroecke

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient, works great.  We're so happy!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to finally get the dishwasher when we read another review that said "This dishwasher saved my relationship." It has definitely made our house happier! It works great and the water softener feature that uses salt is really cool too in case you have hard water.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Seraji

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: Although small, I can fit 2 or 3 meals of dishes in it. I've used the normal wash and heavy duty wash cycles, and it really works well.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Item but Electric Cord Can be a Problem
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, reliable and stainless interior is a plus. This is my second of this item. The design is not perfect where the electric cord and water hose go together. Water hose can constrict and damage the electric cord if the user is not very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sena Lusby

customer_reviews.title: Product working as advertised and company standing behind product
customer_reviews.text: Received dishwasher in 3/13-19. On first use noticed the pump would sound like it was trying to work and then stop. This went on every cycle. After 3 used I call the company. They give me names of repairmen I could call for service at my expense. They do not stand behind their product. I would also add the part that fastens to faucet is cheap plastic
customer_reviews.author: Linda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service and repairs under warranty are terrible!
customer_reviews.text: My wash cycle stopped heating up. I called and it's under warranty but they are not helping me get it repaired or sending me the part I need. It's been hours on hold and weeks with no contact. I just want my dishwasher running again. One year is not long enough considering the cost. It worked well until the heating part failed. Buy a better brand if you're in the market.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: High quality and solid performance
customer_reviews.text: Compact, well built, and intelligently designed - this little dishes cleans exceptionally well and is reasonably quiet. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: ransur0t

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my portable dishwasher!!! This saves me time from doing the dishes every night!! Fits a lot in it too! Easy to use. And cleans very well, even pots! Only issue is the hose adapter doesn’t fit exactly to my faucet and it leaks by dripping out alongside of hose connector. Not sure why and haven’t been able to figure it out.

customer_reviews.title: Don't need to buy faucet fitting
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher is quite and perfect height.. Don't need to purchase a faucet adapter comes with one. Good size holds several plates and glasses. Absolutely love it.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!

product_meta.title: Danby DDW1801MWP Portable Dishwasher, White
product_meta.description: Washing dishes has never been as much fun as it is with this versatile dishwasher by Danby. This attractive machine comes with a silverware basket, an eight place settings capacity and six different wash cycles. It’s just 18 inches wide (45.7 cm) meaning it can easily be installed in condos and apartments and the convenient built-in castors allow you to move it around with ease. Your electricity bills won’t take a beating with this smart unit as it boasts a valuable low-water consumption function and is also Energy Star rated. The appliance features a durable stainless-steel spray arm and interior making it the ideal dishwasher for remote cottage locations. In addition, you’ll find an automatic detergent dispenser and rinse-agent dispenser and the entire unit can easily be programmed by the state-of-the-art electronic controls. This highly-efficient model also comes with a 12-month warranty on parts and labor with in-home service.
feature_bullets: Crisp white portable dishwasher with quick connect feature compatible with most kitchen faucets
8 place setting capacity with silverware basket
At only 18” wide it’s perfect for small kitchens with limited space and easy roll castors make storing it a breeze
Energy star compliant and low water consumption up to 3.5 gallons of water (13.2L) per wash to help save you money
6 wash cycles ranging from Intensive, Normal, Economy, Rapid, Glass and soak
